title: Hygge Siuu
description: A hygge Siuu is commonly used amongst friends, colleagues and even family. This Siuu is well suited for a dinner party and / or a kæmpe mål.

title: Aggressive Siuu
description: When you are ahead with five goals or drinks, this Siuu can be used, but be careful! Siuuuuuuuuuuuuuu.

title: Mega Siuu
description: A SIUU which is a bit more agrresive than the others, this Siuu is well suited for a situation where you scored a kæmpe mål!

title: Jaaaaaa taaaaakkkkkkk
description: When in doubt, always go full adam...maybe
